concept.title: General Information

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Provides general information about the UPS cabinet, component layout, airflow direction, and system design characteristics.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: ups system; cabinet frame; cooling airflow; front door panel; electronic modules; system controller

othermeta.name: tags
othermeta.content: general information, component layout, airflow, cabinet design, system overview, installation preparation

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: provide foundational system information needed before installation or maintenance activities

conbody.p: This manual provides information about Reality Prime systems.
In this manual “the system” refers to the complete system and “the cabinet” refers to the mechanical frame of the system.

The customer specific documents Single Line Diagram, Technical Data, and Drawings are often referred to. It is required that you are familiar with the configuration of the system before installing, operating or performing maintenance on the system.
Any breaker or switch mentioned in this manual can be a switch-disconnector, fuse switch-disconnector or circuit breaker. Please see the Single Line Diagram for type used in your system.
The standard reference designators for parts are mentioned and might be different. For the actual reference designator refer to the Drawings.
All images are only for illustration. The shown examples might differ from the actual system.
